column4: i have an acer aspire 5516 and i cant find a driver for the netcard..:[
run: sudo lshw -C network | grep product
or lspci     will tell you what chip it uses, you can then websearch from there
lspci will tell you what the device is, you can websearch how to set it up from there using websearches
its in the factoid ubottu gav, she is there so we dont have to repeat ourselves
you need to extract the file and read the readme
